actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the 21st Century Cures Act to provide for designation of institutions of higher education that provide research, data, and leadership on continuous manufacturing as National Centers of Excellence in Continuous Pharmaceutical Manufacturing, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Centers of Excellence in Continuous Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Act of 2018
subjects: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

summary.text:
National Centers of Excellence in Continuous Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Act of 2018

This bill authorizes the Food and Drug Administration to partner with institutions of higher education to designate them as National Centers of Excellence in Continuous Pharmaceutical Manufacturing for the purpose of studying and recommending improvements to the process of continuous manufacturing of medications. (Currently, most medications are manufactured in batches.)

titles.title: National Centers of Excellence in Continuous Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Act of 2018
